title: Honor
body:
Hi, Rynojos here, and I was dropped down to 0 in honor. About a week ago, my honor was unlocked. After, ive been pumping out tons of games, and ive been getting a few honors from them. I haven't been toxic and I have been encouraging to keep trying and go for the win. But, i feel my honor level isnt progressing. Is it?
Thanks!

replies.body: Your honor will continue to grow, even if you don't receive any for that match.  There's no progress bar, but rest assured it will continue progressing!
if i play 5 games per day, and i am not toxic at all and i get zero honors, how many days would it take me to level up? (If you can say)

To put in in perspective, I've been in honor 0 for 40 days, playing almost daily, and still haven't gotten out. We've been abandoned, friend. Note to self: Don't tell a 3-man to shut up and get carried; Riot LOVES those guys.
